mapper.select: SELECT SUM(total_price) FROM order_tb WHERE order_date BETWEEN CURRENT_DATE AND CURRENT_DATE + INTERVAL 1 DAY AND status = '결제 완료'

SELECT DATE(order_date) as order_date, SUM(total_price) as total_price FROM order_tb WHERE order_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND status = '결제 완료' GROUP BY DATE(order_date) ORDER BY DATE(order_date)

SELECT YEAR(order_date) as year, WEEK(order_date) as week, SUM(total_price) as total_price FROM order_tb WHERE order_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND status = '결제 완료' GROUP BY YEAR(order_date), WEEK(order_date) ORDER BY YEAR(order_date), WEEK(order_date)

SELECT YEAR(order_date) as year, MONTH(order_date) as month, SUM(total_price) as total_price FROM order_tb WHERE order_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND status = '결제 완료' GROUP BY YEAR(order_date), MONTH(order_date) ORDER BY YEAR(order_date), MONTH(order_date)
